posts.title: Flushable Wipes For Dudes
posts.content: Keep your man bits fresh while on the go by making sure you carry some flushable wipes for dudes. The wipes feature a huge 44 square inch surface and contain vitamin E and soothing aloes that are perfect for cleaning any part of the body – especially the balls.

posts.title: Motorized Water Blaster Bumper Boats
posts.content: Turn a regular trip to the pool into an action-packed day using these motorized water blaster bumper boats. Each boat is propelled by an electric 12-volt motor and comes with a front-mounted blaster that shoots pressurized water up to 20 feet in distance.

posts.title: Wireless Smart Scale and Body Analyzer
posts.content: Ensure you meet your fitness goals by automatically measuring your weight, calculating your BMI, and monitoring body composition changes in muscle, fat, water, and bone using the wireless smart scale and body analyzer.

posts.title: Steel War Hammer
posts.content: Pierce and crush through anything standing in your way using the steel war hammer. Forged out of 5150 steel and differentially heat treated for maximum destructive power, it comes fitted with an elongated wooden handle for maximum leverage.

posts.title: Glass Cloche Smoke Infusing Kit
posts.content: Give your favorite foods a subtle and savory smoky taste using this glass cloche smoke infusing kit. This battery operated handheld smoker lets you conveniently infuse everything from chips to cocktails with an aromatic smoked flavor.

posts.title: Portable Mini Air Humidifier/Purifier
posts.content: Maintain a fresh scent inside your vehicle by attaching this portable mini air-humidifier/purifier to your air vents. This compact device spreads negative ions to counteract excessive positive ions in the air, effectively improving air quality.

posts.title: Elf Ear Earbuds
posts.content: Transform yourself into a mythical Middle Earth creature when you’re jamming out by using these elf ear earbuds. They transmit clear crisp sound and come with pointed tips designed to make your regular human ears look like graceful elf ears.

posts.title: Nobody Likes A Cockblock Book
posts.content: Nobody Likes A Cockblock is a full color paperback children’s book for adults about woodland creature moms and dads just trying to get their swerve on. It’s 32-pages of inappropriate prose that will leave you laughing about your sad, sex deprived life.

posts.title: Outdoor Hanging Swing Chair
posts.content: Turn your patio into your home’s premiere place to relax by sitting down on this outdoor hanging swing chair. Made from all-weather wicker, it sports a sturdy powder coated steel and aluminum frame and provides a soothing side-to-side rocking motion while you rest.

posts.title: Transformers Pen
posts.content: Kick your ADD into high gear when you take the Transformers pen to work or school. Just like the Transformers, there’s more to this pen than meets the eye – providing you with a fully functional pen, and doubling as a kick-ass action figure.

posts.title: Perfect Shirt Folder
posts.content: The parental units will finally get a break from laundry duty once you begin using the perfect shirt folder. Its simple cardboard design lays flat on the table and guides you through each step in the shirt folding process so they end up perfectly folded every time.

posts.title: Light Show Speaker System
posts.content: Get the party started when you show up with the light show speaker system. This fifty watt Bluetooth speaker provides great sound and comes fitted with a disco ball-like light that projects pulsating multicolor patterns onto the walls.
